Alias.name: Raid assist on off
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == "on" then enableTrigger("Raid assist") --RelayAffs = true cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SpringGreen>On <SlateGrey>and ready!") cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <snow>zHELP for help and zSTAT to see system status")
elseif matches[2] == "off" then disableTrigger("Raid assist") --RelayAffs = false cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <IndianRed>Off <SlateGrey>and waiting!") end

Alias.name: Add enemy
Alias.script:
--Alias to add enemies to the list, and will try to spellcheck with Name database
local new_enemy = matches[2]:lower():title() local position = matches[3] or #ra.target_list
--NDB check to use it check spelling of targets
if not ndb then if not table.contains(ra.target_list, new_enemy) then if position < #ra.target_list then table.insert(ra.target_list, position, new_enemy) else table.insert(ra.target_list, new_enemy) end cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<SlateGrey>Target order is: <light_blue>"..table.concat(ra.target_list, ", ")) ra.autoEnemy(new_enemy) else cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<SlateGrey>Target is already in the order") end
--If NDB exists, checks for the persons name elseif ndb.isperson(new_enemy) then if not table.contains(ra.target_list, new_enemy) then if tonumber(position) < #ra.target_list then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <IndianRed>"..new_enemy.." <SlateGrey>sloted at- <cyan>"..position) table.insert(ra.target_list, position, new_enemy) else table.insert(ra.target_list, new_enemy) end cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Target order is: <lemon_chiffon>"..table.concat(ra.target_list, ", "))
--Attempt to enemy them or reminder ra.autoEnemy(new_enemy) else cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<SlateGrey>Target is already in the order") end
else --If NDB doesn't find them, reports. If they are for sure a person, honors them cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<light_blue> NDB doesn't recognize that name") end

Alias.name: Add multiple names
Alias.script:
--Takes multiple names in to add --Yes, I agree, this pattern is a little rediculous! Basically it forces entering names with or without comma and won't allow mixing! --Splits the name up by ,(space) or just spaces if those are used instead --Runs through the list checking if they are on the targetlist already to skip, and also attempted to enemy
local NameList = matches[2]
if NameList:find(",") then --This figures out the type of split to run NameList = string.split(NameList, ", ") else NameList = string.split(NameList, " ") end
for n, v in pairs (NameList) do --This sends the list into the target order and enemies them if its on if not table.contains(ra.target_list, v:title()) then table.insert(ra.target_list, v:title()) ra.autoEnemy(v:title()) end end
cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Added: <IndianRed>" ..table.concat(NameList, ", ")) --Informs the list was recognized

Alias.name: Remove enemy
Alias.script:
local new_enemy = matches[2]:title()
--Remove from the target list table.remove(ra.target_list, table.index_of(ra.target_list, new_enemy))
--Display current target list cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Target order is: <lemon_chiffon>"..table.concat(ra.target_list, ", "))
--attempt to unenemy them or reminder ra.autoUnenemy(new_enemy)

Alias.name: Enemy the list
Alias.script:
--Functions to set the target list to be your enemies
cecho("<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<SlateGrey> Setting enemies to target list!")
send("Unenemy all", false) --If you'd rather only unenemy when its a long list, comment out this and activate the if below, set the number --if #ra.target_list > 5 then send("Unenemy all", false) end
for _,v in pairs (ra.target_list) do --Run a loop over the target list to enemy everyone send("Enemy "..v,false) end
ra.ListEnemied = "Yep" --For status report- enemies have been set

Alias.name: Partial name targeting
Alias.script:
-- Uses target order and allows retargeting with first couple letters local person = matches[2]:lower():title() local found = false
if table.contains(ra.target_list, person) then -- exact match targets target = person ra.announcer("Single") raiseEvent("RA Target Changed") found = true cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<lemon_chiffon> Found/targeted <IndianRed>"..target)
elseif found == false then -- Search target list for a partial match for _, v in pairs(ra.target_list) do if string.starts(v, person) then target = v cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<lemon_chiffon> Found/targeted <IndianRed>"..target) ra.announcer("Single") raiseEvent("RA Target Changed") found = true break end end end send("settarget "..target, false)
--If no match, let you know it didn't find one if found == false then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<lemon_chiffon> Didn't match anyone.") end

Alias.name: Quick target change
Alias.script:
--Set of if statements to check what type of switch is wanted
if matches[2] == "n" then --Next in line to die local position = table.index_of(ra.target_list, target) if position == nil then --Need this check incase your target was not on the list target = ra.target_list[1] elseif position == #ra.target_list then target = ra.target_list[1] else target = ra.target_list[position+1] end cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Next target: <IndianRed>" ..target)
elseif matches[2] == "f" then --Lets hit number one again target = ra.target_list[1] cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Next target: <IndianRed>" ..target)
elseif matches[2] == "t" then target = ra.ToTarget cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <black:white>-----Swapped to party target!-----")
else --Take your pick of who gets it! target = ra.target_list[tonumber(matches[2])] cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Next target: <IndianRed>" ..target) end --send("settarget "..target, false) expandAlias("t "..target)
ra.announcer("Single") raiseEvent("RA Target Changed")

Alias.name: Reorder enemies
Alias.script: ra.order_report()

Alias.name: Raid leader set
Alias.script:
--Set the leader calling the target list and calling target changes
-- if ra.Leader == "Me" or ra.Leader == "Atul" then -- ra.IsLeader = true -- else -- ra.IsLeader = false -- end -- else
ra.Leader = matches[2]:title() cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<red> Group leader changed to: <yellow>".. ra.Leader) if matches[2]:title() == "Me" then ra.IsLeader = true else ra.IsLeader = false end --end

Alias.name: Target callers
Alias.script:
--set this only if the leader(s) are not the primary target callers -- Specific target callers commented out. target switch is in room depedent now -- KEEP THIS DISABLED local person = matches[2]:title() if matches[3] then person2 = matches[3]:title() else end
if person == "None" or person == "Clear" then ra.Caller = "" cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<red> No secondary target calling") elseif person ~= ra.Leader then ra.Caller = person cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<red> Target caller is: <yellow>".. ra.Caller) end
if person2 == "None" or person2 == "Clear" then ra.Caller2 = "" cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<red> No secondary target calling") elseif person2 ~= ra.Leader or person2 ~= ra.Caller then ra.Caller2 = person2 cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<red> Secondary target caller is: <yellow>".. ra.Caller2) end

Alias.name: Full help
Alias.script:
cecho("
<OrangeRed>---Party combat system commands: Full---") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zON,OFF<light_blue>-Raid system all on or off") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zSTAT<light_blue>-Raid system info") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zL <name or 'Me'><light_blue>-Set leader") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zL2 <name> <light_blue>-Set leader") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zORDER<light_blue>-List target order for reordering") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zCALL(F)<light_blue>-Call target order, F forces announce") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zC(F)<light_blue>-Call current target, F forces announce") --cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zTC <name> <name, if needed> <light_blue>-Set specific target callers (1 or 2) if not leaders") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zGROUP <light_blue>-Report leaders, target, target list, callers, and more to party") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zADD name (#)<light_blue>-Add enemy to list at end or into a spot") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zMULTI name, name, name, ect<light_blue>-Add several enemies at once") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zREMOVE name<light_blue>-Remove enemy from list") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zSWAP <name> <#><light_blue>-Manual reordering person to a position") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zENEMY<light_blue>-Enemies the target list") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zAUTO<light_blue>-Enable setting enemies automatically") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zA<light_blue>-Turn on target switching if your target dies!") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zN,zF,z#<light_blue>-Next, First, Position target") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zT <partial name><light_blue>-Target with only first few letters") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zP,zPAUTO/MANUAL<light_blue>-Setting for party leader target switching") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zT<light_blue>-Manual target last leader target call") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zR<light_blue>-Check the room for the highest ordered target and target them") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zLOUD<light_blue>-Make yourself call as if you were leader but not set to lead") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zBW <city letter><light_blue>- Add complete city to target order") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zAR (h|m|t|a|c|e|r|all)<light_blue>-Adds new people in room from that city to list") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zRESET<light_blue>-Empty target list") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zREPORT<light_blue>-Toggle reporting on/off for movement, affliction, and walls at once") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zMOVE<light_blue>-Toggle highlighting target movement") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zAFFS<light_blue>-Toggle reporting target afflictions") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zWALLS<light_blue>-Toggle reporting walls") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zCITY<light_blue>-Change default city to add room targets from") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zLIST<light_blue>-Display saved lists to use") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zDELETE name<light_blue>-Delete a preset") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zSAVE name<light_blue>-Save target order for future") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zLOAD name<light_blue>-Load only those in realms into order") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zSET name<light_blue>-Replicate saved target order") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zSS<light_blue>-Force save settings") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zLS<light_blue>-Force load settings") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>zRE<light_blue>-Reset QL room gag without clearing target order")

Alias.name: Room targeting
Alias.script:
--Use zr or zrt to check all in room and look at target list to target highest priority person
enableTrigger("Stop (Room gag)") enableTrigger("Room gag") send("ql",false)

Alias.name: City target adding
Alias.script:
--This takes a few different forms of a city name and uses bw to make a target order --Before sending the bw text it opens the trigger gate called BW capture
local city = matches[2]:lower()
if city == "t" or city == "targ" or city == "targossas" then enableTrigger("BW capture") cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Adding <SpringGreen>Targossas") send("bw targossas", false) elseif city == "h" or city == "hash" or city == "hashan" then enableTrigger("BW capture") cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Adding <brown>Hashan") send("bw hashan", false) elseif city == "e" or city == "eles" or city == "eleusis" then enableTrigger("BW capture") cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Adding <SpringGreen>Eleusis") send("bw Eleusis", false) elseif city == "c" or city == "cyr" or city == "cyrene" then enableTrigger("BW capture") cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Adding <sky_blue>Cyrene") send("bw cyrene", false) elseif city == "a" or city == "ash" or city == "ashtan" then enableTrigger("BW capture") cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Adding <orange>Ashtan") send("bw ashtan", false) elseif city == "m" or city == "mhal" or city == "mhaldor" then enableTrigger("BW capture") cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Adding <firebrick>Mhaldor") send("bw mhaldor", false) else cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>City not recognized") end

Alias.name: Call regardless of leading
Alias.script:
--Overrides allowing to call out target changes (and list order) as if you are the leader- good to have a few people with this on if ra.Leader ~= "Me" then if ra.IsLeader == false then ra.IsLeader = true ra.Settings.OverRide = true cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <IndianRed>WILL <lemon_chiffon> always call targets!") elseif ra.IsLeader == true then ra.IsLeader = false ra.Settings.OverRide = false cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>WON't always call targets!") end elseif ra.Leader == "Me" then cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <lemon_chiffon>YOU are the <SpringGreen>Leader<lemon_chiffon>, don't worry about this!") end

Alias.name: Status report with commands
Alias.script:
cecho("
<OrangeRed>---Party combat system status:") if isActive("Raid assist", "trigger") == 1 then cecho("<OrangeRed>(On)") elseif isActive("Raid assist", "trigger") == 0 then cecho("<IndianRed>(OFF!)")end cecho("<snow>-'zON/zOFF'")
cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Group leader: <cyan>"..ra.Leader.." <snow>-'zL'") -- Specific target callers commented out. target switch is in room depedent now -- if ra.Caller ~= "" then --cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Target Caller <dodger_blue>" ..ra.Caller.."<snow>- ztc 'person'") --end --if ra.Caller2 ~= "" then --cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>2nd Caller <dodger_blue>" ..ra.Caller2.."<snow>-ztc 'person' 'person2'") --end cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Targeting: <dodger_blue>" ..target) cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Enemy list: <light_blue>" ..table.concat(ra.target_list, ", ").." <snow>- zEnemy") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>List cmds: <snow>-'zORDER' 'zAdd name (#)' 'zREMOVE name' 'zAR cityletter'") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>List cmds2: <snow>-'zSWAP name #'") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Enemied list: <MistyRose>" .. ra.ListEnemied.." <snow>-'zENEMY'") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Auto-enemy: <MistyRose>" .. ra.Settings.SetEnemy.." <snow>-'zAUTO'") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Call target: <MistyRose>" .. tostring(ra.IsLeader):title().." <snow>-'zC(F)', 'zCALL(F)', 'zLOUD'") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Re-Targeting: <MistyRose>" .. tostring(ra.Settings.SetTarget):title().." <snow>-'zA' or 'zR to room scan'") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Moved report: <MistyRose>" .. tostring(ra.Settings.MoveReporting):title().." <snow>-'zMOVE'") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Aff reporting: <MistyRose>" .. tostring(ra.Settings.AffCalling):title().." <snow>-'zAFFS'") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Wall reporting:<MistyRose>" .. tostring(ra.Settings.WallCalling):title().." <snow>-'zWALLS'") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>City target: <MistyRose>" .. ra.Settings.CityTargeting.." <snow>- 'zCITY name' or letter") cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Party target: <SlateGrey>" ..ra.Settings.TargetSwitch.." <snow>-'zT to target', 'zP to toggle setting'")

Alias.name: Status report short version
Alias.script:
cecho("
<OrangeRed>---Party combat system status:") if isActive("Raid assist", "trigger") == 1 then cecho("<OrangeRed>(On)") elseif isActive("Raid assist", "trigger") == 0 then cecho("<IndianRed>(OFF!)")end
cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Group leader: <cyan>"..ra.Leader) -- Specific target callers commented out. target switch is in room depedent now -- if ra.Caller ~= "" then --cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Target Caller <dodger_blue>" ..ra.Caller.."<snow>- ztc 'person'") --end --if ra.Caller2 ~= "" then --cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>2nd Caller <dodger_blue>" ..ra.Caller2.."<snow>-ztc 'person' 'person2'") --end cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Targeting: <dodger_blue>" ..target) cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Enemy list: <light_blue>" ..table.concat(ra.target_list, ", ")) cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Enemied list: <MistyRose>" .. ra.ListEnemied) cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Auto-enemy: <MistyRose>" .. ra.Settings.SetEnemy) cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Call target: <MistyRose>" .. tostring(ra.IsLeader):title()) cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Re-Targeting: <MistyRose>" .. tostring(ra.Settings.SetTarget):title()) cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Moved report: <MistyRose>" .. tostring(ra.Settings.MoveReporting):title()) cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Aff reporting: <MistyRose>" .. tostring(ra.Settings.AffCalling):title()) cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Wall reporting:<MistyRose>" .. tostring(ra.Settings.WallCalling):title()) cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>City target: <MistyRose>" .. ra.Settings.CityTargeting) cecho("
<light_blue>-<yellow>Party target: <SlateGrey>" .. ra.Settings.TargetSwitch)

Alias.name: Group report
Alias.script: cecho("\n<OrangeRed>---Party combat system status:") if isActive("Raid assist", "trigger") == 1 then cecho("<OrangeRed>(On)") elseif isActive("Raid assist", "trigger") == 0 then cecho("<IndianRed>(OFF!)")end if ra.Leader == "Me" then send("pt Leader: Atul") else send("pt Leader: "..ra.Leader) end -- Specific target callers commented out. target switch is in room depedent now -- if ra.Caller == "" and ra.Caller2 == "" then --send("pt Follow "..ra.Leader.." targets") --elseif ra.Caller ~= "" and ra.Caller2 == "" then --send("pt Follow "..ra.Caller.." targets") --elseif ra.Caller ~= "" and ra.Caller ~= "" then --send("pt Follow "..ra.Caller.." and "..ra.Caller2.." targets") --elseif ra.Leader then --send("pt Follow Atul targets") --else --send("pt Follow "..ra.Leader.." targets") -- end send("pt Targeting: "..target) send("pt Enemy list: "..table.concat(ra.target_list, ", ")) send("pt Rally at "..gmcp.Room.Info.name..", in "..gmcp.Room.Info.area) send("pt City target: " .. ra.Settings.CityTargeting)

Alias.name: Target position swap
Alias.script:
local name = matches[2]:lower():title() local position = matches[3]
if table.contains(ra.target_list, name) and tonumber(position) < #ra.target_list then table.remove(ra.target_list, table.index_of(ra.target_list, name)) table.insert(ra.target_list, position, name) cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<lemon_chiffon> Moved: " ..name.. " to #"..position) end
if #ra.target_list < tonumber(position) then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<lemon_chiffon>Order isnâ€™t that long.") end
if not table.contains(ra.target_list, name) then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <lemon_chiffon> Name not found in the order.") end

Alias.name: In room add
Alias.script:
--Pretty straight forward- Takes the city letter or all and looks through the room for who's from their and not on the list and addes them. --Careful using all! Between this adding friendlies and autotarget switching- you'll start to hit friends eventually.
local city
if matches[2] == "all" then local NewNames = {} for _,v in pairs(ra.InRoom) do if not table.contains(ra.target_list, v) then table.insert(ra.target_list, v) table.insert(NewNames, v) end end if #NewNames > 0 then cecho("

<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>-Careful! Adding the whole room! Added Targets: <lemon_chiffon>"..table.concat(NewNames, ", ")) else cecho("

<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>-No new targets found-") end return end
if not ndb then --If you set up your own Name data base in the below script delete this check. cecho("

<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<lemon_chiffon>====No Name Database--Need to set this up to work====") return end
if matches[2] == nil then if ra.Settings.CityTargeting == "none" then cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<SlateGrey> No city set") return else local NewNames = {} city = ra.Settings.CityTargeting for _,v in pairs(ra.InRoom) do if not table.contains(ra.target_list, v) then if ndb.getcity(v) == city then table.insert(ra.target_list, v) table.insert(NewNames, v) end end end if #NewNames > 0 then cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Added these "..city.." Targets: <lemon_chiffon>"..table.concat(NewNames, ", "))
if ra.Settings.SetEnemy == "Yep" then for _,v in pairs (NewNames) do --Enemy the new people if you have auto enemy going. send("Enemy "..v,false) end end else cecho("

<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>-No new targets found from "..city.."-") end return end end
if matches[2] == "h" then city = "Hashan" elseif matches[2] == "m" then city = "Mhaldor" elseif matches[2] == "t" then city = "Targossas" elseif matches[2] == "a" then city = "Ashtan" elseif matches[2] == "c" then city = "Cyrene" elseif matches[2] == "e" then city = "Eleusis" elseif matches[2] == "r" then city = "Rogue" end
local NewNames = {} for _,v in pairs(ra.InRoom) do if not table.contains(ra.target_list, v) then if ndb.getcity(v) == city then table.insert(ra.target_list, v) table.insert(NewNames, v) end end end
if #NewNames > 0 then cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Added these "..city.." Targets: <lemon_chiffon>"..table.concat(NewNames, ", ")) if ra.Settings.SetEnemy == "Yep" then for _,v in pairs (NewNames) do --Enemy the new people if you have auto enemy going. send("Enemy "..v,false) end end else cecho("

<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>-No new targets found from "..city.."-") end

Alias.name: Type of target changing
Alias.script:
--Whether you want the system to change targets or not --Good to set to off if the party lead is alive and calling --Good to set to on if they're not around- KIA or MIA
if ra.Settings.SetTarget == false then ra.Settings.SetTarget = true cecho("<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>We <SpringGreen>WILL<SlateGrey> handle changing targets!") else ra.Settings.SetTarget = false cecho("<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>We <IndianRed>WON'T<SlateGrey> handle changing targets!") end

Alias.name: Party targeting
Alias.script:
--If its not, allows settings changes to how party target calls are handled if matches[2] == "p" then if ra.Settings.TargetSwitch == "auto" then ra.Settings.TargetSwitch = "manual" cecho("<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey> Party targeting: <MistyRose>" ..ra.Settings.TargetSwitch) elseif ra.Settings.TargetSwitch == "manual" then ra.Settings.TargetSwitch = "auto" cecho("<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey> Party targeting: <SpringGreen>" ..ra.Settings.TargetSwitch) else ra.Settings.TargetSwitch = "manual" cecho("<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey> Party targeting: <MistyRose>" ..ra.Settings.TargetSwitch) end
elseif matches[2] == "pauto" then ra.Settings.TargetSwitch = "auto" cecho("<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey> Party targeting: <SpringGreen>" ..ra.Settings.TargetSwitch)
elseif matches[2] == "pmanual" then ra.Settings.TargetSwitch = "manual" cecho("<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey> Party targeting: <MistyRose>" ..ra.Settings.TargetSwitch) end

Alias.name: Auto enemy toggle
Alias.script:
--Switch auto enemy with za or zauto
if ra.Settings.SetEnemy == "Yep" then ra.Settings.SetEnemy = "Nope" cecho("<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>We <IndianRed>WON'T<SlateGrey> auto-enemy!") else ra.Settings.SetEnemy = "Yep" cecho("<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>We <SpringGreen>WILL<SlateGrey> auto-enemy!") end

Alias.name: Force settings save
Alias.script: ra.saveSettings()

Alias.name: Force Load settings
Alias.script: ra.loadSettings()

Alias.name: Toggle All Reporting
Alias.script:
if isActive("Opponent movement", "trigger") == 0 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SpringGreen>WILL<SlateGrey> report target movement!") send("pt Reporting Target Movement") enableTrigger("Opponent movement") ra.Settings.MoveReporting = true
elseif isActive("Opponent movement", "trigger") == 1 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <IndianRed>WON'T<SlateGrey> report target movement!") send("pt No Longer Reporting Target Movement") disableTrigger("Opponent movement") ra.Settings.MoveReporting = false
end
if isActive("Aff Reporting", "trigger") == 0 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SpringGreen>WILL<SlateGrey> report afflictions to party!") send("pt Reporting Afflictions") enableTrigger("Aff Reporting") ra.Settings.AffCalling = true
elseif isActive("Aff Reporting", "trigger") == 1 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <IndianRed>WON'T<SlateGrey> report afflictions to party!") send("pt No Longer Reporting Afflictions") disableTrigger("Aff Reporting") ra.Settings.AffCalling = false
end
if isActive("Wall Calls", "trigger") == 0 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SpringGreen>WILL<SlateGrey> report walls!") send("pt Reporting Walls") enableTrigger("Wall Calls") ra.Settings.WallCalling = true
elseif isActive("Wall Calls", "trigger") == 1 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <IndianRed>WON'T<SlateGrey> report walls!") send("pt No Longer Reporting Walls") disableTrigger("Wall Calls") ra.Settings.WallCalling = false
end

Alias.name: Target movement reporting
Alias.script:
if isActive("Opponent movement", "trigger") == 0 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SpringGreen>WILL<SlateGrey> report target movement!") send("pt Reporting Target Movement") enableTrigger("Opponent movement") ra.Settings.MoveReporting = true
elseif isActive("Opponent movement", "trigger") == 1 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <IndianRed>WON'T<SlateGrey> report target movement!") send("pt No Longer Reporting Target Movement") disableTrigger("Opponent movement") ra.Settings.MoveReporting = false
end

Alias.name: Target aff reporting
Alias.script:
if isActive("Aff Reporting", "trigger") == 0 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SpringGreen>WILL<SlateGrey> report afflictions to party!") send("pt Reporting Afflictions") enableTrigger("Aff Reporting") ra.Settings.AffCalling = true
elseif isActive("Aff Reporting", "trigger") == 1 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <IndianRed>WON'T<SlateGrey> report afflictions to party!") send("pt No Longer Reporting Afflictions") disableTrigger("Aff Reporting") ra.Settings.AffCalling = false
end

Alias.name: Wall reporting
Alias.script:
if isActive("Wall Calls", "trigger") == 0 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SpringGreen>WILL<SlateGrey> report walls!") send("pt Reporting Walls") enableTrigger("Wall Calls") ra.Settings.WallCalling = true
elseif isActive("Wall Calls", "trigger") == 1 then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <IndianRed>WON'T<SlateGrey> report walls!") send("pt No Longer Reporting Walls") disableTrigger("Wall Calls") ra.Settings.WallCalling = false
end

Alias.name: In room city target setting
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == nil then cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>City capture set to: <IndianRed>"..ra.Settings.CityTargeting.."!") return end
local city = matches[2]:lower()
if city == "t" or city == "targ" or city == "targossas" then ra.Settings.CityTargeting = "Targossas" cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>City capture set to: <IndianRed>Targossas!") elseif city == "h" or city == "hash" or city == "hashan" then ra.Settings.CityTargeting = "Hashan" cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>City capture set to: <IndianRed>Hashan!") elseif city == "e" or city == "eles" or city == "eleusis" then ra.Settings.CityTargeting = "Eleusis" cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>City capture set to: <IndianRed>Eleusis!") elseif city == "c" or city == "cyr" or city == "cyrene" then ra.Settings.CityTargeting = "Cyrene" cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>City capture set to: <IndianRed>Cyrene!") elseif city == "a" or city == "ash" or city == "ashtan" then ra.Settings.CityTargeting = "Ashtan" cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>City capture set to: <IndianRed>Ashtan!") elseif city == "m" or city == "mhal" or city == "mhaldor" then ra.Settings.CityTargeting = "Mhaldor" cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>City capture set to: <IndianRed>Mhaldor!") elseif city == "none" or city == "reset" or city == "clear" then ra.Settings.CityTargeting = "" cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>City capture set to: <IndianRed>none!") else cecho("
<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>City not recognized") end

Alias.name: Preset delete
Alias.script: ra.deletepreset(matches[2])

Alias.name: Preset lists
Alias.script:
-- Alias for saving, loading (this is a force load attempt, should load fine starting up), and seeing/using a setlist
--save function with a name check if matches[2] == "save" then if matches[3] then ra.save(matches[3]) elseif matches[3] == nil then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <lemon_chiffon>Need a name to save with!") end end
--Load if matches[2] == "loadsettings" then ra.load() end
--display your presets for using if matches[2] == "list" then ra.displaypresets() end
--Using a preset if matches[2] == "set" then if matches[3] then ra.setpreset(matches[3]) elseif matches[3] == nil then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <lemon_chiffon>Need a name to set a preset!") end end
--This uses a preset and checks who is in realms with QW. if matches[2] == "load" then if matches[3] then local name = matches[3]:lower():title() if table.contains(ra_list, name) then ra.TempTargetList = table.deepcopy(ra_list[tostring(name)]) enableTrigger("QW Target Check") send("qw") else cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <lemon_chiffon>Don't know that list!") end
elseif matches[3] == nil then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <lemon_chiffon>Need a name to load preset!") end end

Alias.name: Target order call
Alias.script:
--Alias to call out the target list --You can force call your known list on pt by adding f to overide not calling stuff
if ra.IsLeader then ra.announcer("full") elseif matches[2] == nil then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>You are <IndianRed>NOT <SlateGrey>the leader. Add <SpringGreen>'f'<SlateGrey> to force call") cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul): <SlateGrey>Target order is: <lemon_chiffon>"..table.concat(ra.target_list, ", ")) end
if matches[2] == "f" then send(string.format("pt Target order is: %s", table.concat(ra.target_list, ", ")),false) end

Alias.name: Call current target
Alias.script:
-- if you're the leader, this will call the current target, good for if people as what the target is -- Can also force announcing the target if not the leader with f modifier similar to zcall for order getServerEncodingsList
if ra.IsLeader then ra.announcer("Single") elseif matches[2] == "f" then cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<lemon_chiffon> Forcing target call") send(string.format("pt Target: %s", target),false) else cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<SlateGrey> You are not the leader- add <SpringGreen>'f'<SlateGrey> to force call!") end

Alias.name: Reset targets and callers
Alias.script:
--Clears the list of targets ra.target_list = {}
if ra.Settings.SetEnemy == "Yep" then send("unenemy all") end
--Clears Leaders and Callers ra.Leader = "" --ra.Caller = "" --ra.Caller2 = ""
--Clear targets target = "none" ra.ToTarget = "none"
cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<yellow> All leaders and targets cleared!") disableTrigger("Room gag") enableTrigger("Stop (Room gag)")

Alias.name: Reset Room triggers
Alias.script: -- This alias resets the room QL gaging triggers disableTrigger("Room gag") enableTrigger("Stop (Room gag)") cecho("\n<OrangeRed>(CombAtul):<SlateGrey> Reset Room gag")
